DESCRIPTION: #yUnplayable #yRetaining cards. The effect of the leftmost Trap in your hand is triggered when you take unblocked damage.
Activate the leftmost #yTrap in your hand on a random enemy.
Enemies with Maledict take #b50% more non-attack damage.
When an enemy performs a non-attack action, they take damage equal to your Spines.
Enemies affected by Venom lose #b1 HP whenever they take damage.
